verses.name: Genesis 7:4
verses.text: For yet seven days, and I will cause it to rain upon the earth forty days and forty nights; and every living substance that I have made will I destroy from off the face of the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 7:5
verses.text: And Noah did according unto all that the Lord commanded him.

verses.name: Genesis 7:6
verses.text: And Noah was six hundred years old when the flood of waters was upon the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 7:7
verses.text: And Noah went in, and his sons, and his wife, and his sons’ wives with him, into the ark, because of the waters of the flood.
